CFF2120D-9CB4-432B-B226-E943B8BE2536.text: This action runs a Python script that can be configured with your own parameters. Tap and hold the action to edit the script or the parameters that are shown here. This comment is actually a text parameter itself – feel free to remove it.

parameters.__custom_action_script__:
#coding: utf-8
import workflow,re,urllib
allLinks=""
url = workflow.get_parameters().get('URL')
htmlSource=urllib.urlopen(url).read(200000)
linksList=re.findall('href=[\'"]?([^\'" >]+)',htmlSource)
for link in linksList:
	allLinks=allLinks + link + '\n'

workflow.set_output(allLinks)
